snippet: A warden has been fired after an inmate was left in a scalding shower until he died in 2012.
abstract: Florida prison warden Jerry Cummings is fired after an inmate was left in a scalding shower until he died in 2012; assistant warden and another prison leader are also replaced; Department of Corrections says it took too long for leaders at Dade Correctional Institute to investigate death of Darren Rainey.
lead_paragraph: A warden has been fired after an inmate was left in a scalding shower until he died in 2012.

headline.main: Florida: Death of Inmate in Shower Leads to the Firing of a Warden
headline.print_headline: Florida: Death of Inmate in Shower Leads to the Firing of a Warden
